General.Name: LightPath Technologies Inc
General.Description: LightPath Technologies, Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and distributes optical components and assemblies. It offers precision molded glass aspheric optics, molded and diamond-turned infrared aspheric lenses, and other optical components used to produce products that manipulate light; and infrared products, including catalog and custom infrared optics. The company's products are used in defense products, medical devices, laser aided industrial tools, automotive safety applications, barcode scanners, optical data storage, hybrid fiber coax datacom, telecommunications, machine vision and sensors, and other sectors. It sells its products directly to customers in Europe and Asia. LightPath Technologies, Inc. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Orlando, Florida.
General.Address: 2603 Challenger Tech Court, Orlando, FL, United States, 32826
